alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 11:17AM EST until January 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. For the Red River...including Clay City...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Several roads are impassable in and around Clay City. Some homes are flooded in low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and crest at a stage of 20.9 feet by early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 5 PM.
